# Introduction

```{r}
#| label: data
film <- read.csv("C:/Users/86150/Desktop/dataset07.csv")
View(film)
head(film)
glimpse(film)
summary(film)
#Use the median to fill in missing values (NA) 
film_clean <- film %>%
  mutate(across(where(is.numeric), ~ ifelse(is.na(.), median(., na.rm = TRUE), .)))
film_clean %>%
  select(year,length,budget,votes,rating)%>%
  cor()
```
